mapper.select: SELECT EMPL_ID, EMPL_NAME, EMPL_PHONE, EMPL_DEPT, EMPL_GRADE, PHOTO_NAME, PHOTO_PATH, EMPL_NOTES, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID FROM TB_EMPL ORDER BY EMPL_GRADE ASC, EMPL_DEPT ASC
SELECT EMPL_ID, EMPL_NAME, EMPL_PHONE, EMPL_DEPT, EMPL_GRADE, PHOTO_NAME, PHOTO_PATH, EMPL_NOTES, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID FROM TB_EMPL WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_EMPL ( EMPL_ID, EMPL_NAME, EMPL_PHONE, EMPL_DEPT, EMPL_GRADE, PHOTO_NAME, PHOTO_PATH, EMPL_NOTES, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_ID, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_ID ) VALUES ( #{emplId}, #{emplName}, #{emplPhone}, #{emplDept}, #{emplGrade}, #{photoName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photoPath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{emplNotes}, SYSDATE, #{createdId}, SYSDATE, #{createdId} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_EMPL SET EMPL_NAME = #{emplName}, EMPL_PHONE = #{emplPhone}, EMPL_DEPT = #{emplDept}, EMPL_GRADE = #{emplGrade}, PHOTO_NAME = #{photoName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHOTO_PATH = #{photoPath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMPL_NOTES = #{emplNotes}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_ID = #{updatedId} WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId}
UPDATE TB_EMPL SET PHOTO_NAME = #{photoName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHOTO_PATH = #{photoPath, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE, UPDATED_ID = #{updatedId} WHERE EMPL_ID = #{emplId}
